name: Godfried Wein
part_bio: THERE ARE NO PARTINGS IN HEAVEN
bio:
WEIN Godfried Wein
died Sept. 14, 1916
aged 82 yrs. 1 mo. 2 ds.
There are no partings in heaven
Agnes his wife
died Nov. 5, 1919
aged 84 yrs. 8 ms. 28 ds.
John George
son of Godfried & Agnes Wein
died May 6, 1889
aged 25 yrs. 9 mos. 6 ds.
(back)Paul Schink
1854-1939
his wife Wilhelmina Wein
1863-1943
their son Herbert
1896-1979
